tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lighting_control (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    natural_light_intensity INT,
    lighting_intensity INT,
    automated_adjustment BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE LightingControl (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    light_zone INT NOT NULL,
    light_intensity INT NOT NULL,
    auto_adjust BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    temperature_threshold FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)
